K

KMeans - Class in com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common
An in-memory implementation of the k-means algorithm that can be configured to create various numbers of clusters using different KMeansInitStrategy initialization strategies and updated with different KMeansUpdateStrategy rules.
KMeans() - Constructor for class com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common.KMeans
Constructor that uses the k-means++ initialization strategy and 100 iterations of Lloyd's algorithm.
KMeans(KMeansInitStrategy, KMeansUpdateStrategy) - Constructor for class com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common.KMeans
Creates an in-memory k-means execution engine.
KMeansEvalStrategy - Interface in com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common
 
KMeansInitStrategy - Enum in com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common
The strategies used to choose the initial Centers used for a k-means algorithm run prior to running Lloyd's algorithm.
KMeansPMML - Class in com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common.pmml
Convenience methods to read/write a ClusteringModel description of a k-means clustering.
